title: Earn Zone
description: EarnZone is a micro-task-based online platform where users can earn coins by completing small tasks. These coins can later be withdrawn or used for various services within the platform.

title: Volunteer Hub
description: Volunteer Hub is a community-driven platform connecting passionate individuals with volunteering opportunities. From environment to education, we help people give back, grow skills, and make a real impact.

title: Movie Portal
description: Discover the latest movies, top-rated classics, and trending trailers—all in one place. Movie Portal is your gateway to the world of cinema, reviews, and entertainment updates.

title: Camping-Retreats
description: Escape the chaos and reconnect with nature through unforgettable camping and retreat experiences. From serene forests to mountain hideaways, we offer the perfect getaway for peace and adventure.

title: PlayerMart-website
description: Gadget-Heavens is an inventory management website for electronic gadgets. Users can browse products, place orders, and efficiently manage stock levels, with minimum quantity alerts to help with restocking and smooth inventory control.

title: GadgetNest
description: GadgetNest is an inventory management website for electronic gadgets. Users can browse products, place orders, and efficiently manage stock levels, with minimum quantity alerts to help with restocking and smooth inventory control.

title: Beautiful_Pets
description: Beautiful_Pets is your go-to destination for everything pets — care tips, adorable stories, and quality products. Celebrate the joy of pet companionship with us!

title: Alphabet_Game_Pro
description: Alphabet_Game_Pro is a JavaScript-based typing game where users type the shown letters without looking at the keyboard. Each correct input earns 1 point, helping improve reflexes and focus.

title: DonateBD
description: DonateBD is a trusted platform connecting donors with impactful charitable causes across Bangladesh. Empower communities by contributing to health, education, and disaster relief efforts.

title: HomeVibe-Project
description: HomeVibe is a lifestyle project focused on modern living, interior inspiration, and cozy home solutions. Discover ideas, products, and vibes that turn a house into a home.

title: TrainTribe-Website
description: TrainTribe is a community-driven platform for train lovers, travelers, and commuters. Explore routes, share experiences, and stay updated with everything about rail journeys.

title: Developer-Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio showcasing my skills, projects, and journey as a web developer. Built to reflect my passion for clean code, creative design, and problem-solving.
